name: Poker
tagline: Poker hand evaluator, enumerator and equity calculator
body: # Poker Poker hand evaluator, enumerator and equity calculator ## Table of Contents 1. [Roadmap](#roadmap) Roadmap --- - [ ] Develop generic Equity calculator and Holdem implementation by 13/09/2015 - [ ] Develop additional functionality for Omaha, 7 Stud & Hand Distribution by 27/09/2015 - [ ] Prepare the Documentation & Test Cases by 11/10/2015 - [ ] Add few more equity calculators and polish the code & documentation by 25/10/2015
